doc:
Georgette Harvey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georgette_Harvey 0 Georgette Harvey (1882–1952) was an American singer and actress. She is perhaps most famous for creating the role of Maria in the original Broadway production of Porgy (1927) and the 1935 Broadway production of George Gershwin's opera Porgy and Bess. Georgette_Harvey ( 1882 – 1952 ) was an_American_singer_and_actress . She is_perhaps most_famous for creating the_role of Maria in the_original_Broadway_production of Porgy_(_1927_) and the_1935_Broadway_production of George_Gershwin 's_opera_Porgy_and_Bess .
